titles.title: To reauthorize grants for the Rape, Abuse and Incest National Network, and for other purposes.
National Sexual Assault Hotline Grants Reauthorization Act
National Sexual Assault Hotline Grants Reauthorization Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
National Sexual Assault Hotline Grants Reauthorization Act
This bill reauthorizes grants for the Rape, Abuse & Incest National Network for FY2022-FY2028.
